t: Buckle (clothing retailer) - Wikipedia
s: April 10, 2025 - In 1977, the company introduced women's clothing and the first mall-based location was opened. In 1991, Brass Buckle changed its name to The Buckle, Inc. and began development of private clothing label 'bkle', known today as BKE. The following year, the company went public on the NASDAQ, where ...
